title.rendered: Perky Pear Shape Up for Success with 3PL

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” overlay_strength=”0.3″ shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_link_target=”_self” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” overlay_strength=”0.3″ column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column_text]Perky Pear, the ingenious non-surgical breast lift tape created by Samantha Ryder in 2015, have partnered with 3PL, the UK’s leading provider of multichannel eCommerce fulfilment for fast-growing brands to help them provider enhanced shipping experience for their growing customer base.

The Perky Pear product was created after Samantha saw a gap in the market for a tape which could offer support for bigger breasts without the need for a bra. She identified an opportunity and set about finding a solution, creating a breast lift tape that could not only offer support but could also help to shape the breasts while still offering comfort. Resulting in the world’s first cotton-based breast lift and shape tape and empowering all women to celebrate their bodies with confidence. Since the products initial launch, it has become a firm favourite with women around the world. Even being worn at major awards events by celebrities.

Perky Pear’s partnership with 3PL comes as a result of the products incredible popularity with consumers and growing demand from customers and major fashion retailers. 3PL’s expertise in delivering multichannel fulfilment solutions across both eCommerce and retail will support Perky Pears expansion across both channels

“Receiving a product is such a personal experience, especially with a brand like Perky Pear that caters to all women.” Chris Plant, Sales Manager at 3PL commented “At 3PL, the customer experience is at the centre of everything we do, we strive to ensure our partners provide their customers with the same level of care and excellence that they would offer if fulfilling in house. As a growing brand, with global ambitions, Perky Pear are a perfect partner.” 

“We are excited to be teaming up with 3PL to help our growth and deliver our products to our UK and European consumers.” Samantha Ryder, Perky Pear Founder commented “By partnering up with 3PL we hope to be able to provide a more streamlined and reliable service to our customers both in retail and those shopping on our website. Having done this in house from day one, it was a huge step for us handing fulfilment and shipping over, but we are looking forward to seeing how 3PL will make an impact.”

To shop Perky Pear products, visit www.perkypear.com

 

About 3PL

Based in Wigan, 3PL provides multichannel ecommerce fulfilment & logistics to fast growing brands. As an end-to-end fulfilment solution, 3PL operates from over 250,000 sq. ft of shared user warehousing in the UK, supported by access to a network of International warehouses to support International expansion for its clients. Its fast-moving operations house over 9 million units of stock, across 32,000 product lines.

About Perky Pear

Perky Pear® is a woman lead business with a female board of directors! Samantha and her twin sister Charlotte who then joined forces with US based Brooke Wagner & Shelly Stayer.  The women joined forces with the goal to elevate the brand on a global scale taking Perky Pear® to the next level with the main aim to improve women’s lives all over the world to increase wardrobe options and body confidence! Since Perky Pear exploded into the market, we have created a movement within our industry and continue to lead with our innovative products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
